LanguageData.SonicInhibitor.label: Sonic Inhibitor
LanguageData.SonicInhibitor.description: A device designed to destroy Tiberium and prevent further growth. Due to the experimental nature of the device, it requires direct line of sight to the Tiberium to function
LanguageData.SonicInhibitor_Blueprint.label: Sonic Inhibitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitor_Blueprint_Install.label: Sonic Inhibitor (blueprint)
LanguageData.SonicInhibitor_Frame.label: Sonic Inhibitor (building)
LanguageData.Decrystallizer.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer
LanguageData.Decrystallizer.description: Very slowly removes Tiberium from infected ground, converting any Tiberium ground into decrystallized soil that can be used again. Does not affect contaminated water. Requires power.
LanguageData.Decrystallizer_Blueprint.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Decrystallizer_Blueprint_Install.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer (blueprint)
LanguageData.Decrystallizer_Frame.label: Tiberium Soil Decrystallizer (building)
LanguageData.SonicFence_TBNS.label: Sonic Inhibitor Fence
LanguageData.SonicFence_TBNS.description: This fence allows you to cut off Tiberium spread. Requires power.
LanguageData.SonicFence_TBNS_Blueprint.label: Sonic Inhibitor Fence (blueprint)
LanguageData.SonicFence_TBNS_Frame.label: Sonic Inhibitor Fence (building)
